con:method.name: v1_event_dates
con:method.con:description: This call returns list of dates for which **RCCS** events are avaiable on sale. Fetch lists of dates(NYSS)

con:parameter.con:name: event_id
con:parameter.con:description: The unique ID of event resource.

con:method.name: v1_events_seatmap
con:method.con:description: This call returns pricing and details of the sections in seatmap by purchase flow. Fetch seatmap by purchase flow

con:parameter.con:name: purchase_flow
con:parameter.con:description: Return seatmap of the event by tickets purchase flow. Possible values are `individual` or `group`.

con:method.name: v2_artists
con:method.con:description:
This call returns list of available artists.
Fetch lists of artists

con:parameter.con:name: artist_name
con:parameter.con:description: Return only artists matching the specified full/partial artist name (e.g. `PAW Patrol`).

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is `1`.

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: Return all artists filtered by applied artist id.

con:method.name: v2_artists_id
con:method.con:description:
This call returns list of available artists.
Fetch lists of artists

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is `1`.

con:method.name: v2_event_dates
con:method.con:description:
This call returns list of available event dates for which events are avaiable on sale, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.
Fetch list of available event dates

con:parameter.con:name: start_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having start date `greater than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If start_date exists, end_date is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: end_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having start date `less than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If end_date exists, start_date is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: min_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having price `greater than equal to` min_price for requested purchase flow. If min_price exists, max_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: max_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all event dates having price `less than equal to` max_price for requested purchase flow. If max_price exists, min_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: promo_code
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied promo code.

con:parameter.con:name: venue_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied venue id.

con:parameter.con:name: artist_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates filtered by applied artist id.

con:parameter.con:name: sort_by
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates sorted by date ascending[sort_by=date] and descending[sort_by=-date].

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is 20.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is 1.

con:method.name: v2_events_all
con:method.con:description:
This call returns list of events, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.
Fetch list of events

con:parameter.con:name: start_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having start date `greater than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If start_date exists, end_date is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: end_date
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having start date `less than or equal to` Start date. Expected format - `MMDDYYYY`. If end_date exists, start_date is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: min_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having price `greater than equal to` min_price for requested purchase flow. If min_price exists, max_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: max_price
con:parameter.con:description: Return all events having price `less than equal to max_price` for requested purchase flow. If max_price exists, min_price is mandatory field.

con:parameter.con:name: promo_code
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied promo code.

con:parameter.con:name: venue_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied venue id.

con:parameter.con:name: artist_id
con:parameter.con:description: Returns events filtered by applied artist id.

con:parameter.con:name: sort_by
con:parameter.con:description: Returns event dates sorted by date ascendingly[sort_by=date] and descendingly[sort_by=-date].

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is `1`.

con:parameter.con:name: lat
con:parameter.con:description: Filter events by latitude

con:parameter.con:name: long
con:parameter.con:description: Filter events by longitude

con:parameter.con:name: radius
con:parameter.con:description: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events. Default is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: unit
con:parameter.con:description: Unit of the radius `['miles', 'km']`. Default is `miles`.

con:parameter.con:name: name
con:parameter.con:description: Return only events matching the specified full/partial event name (e.g. `PAW Patrol`).

con:parameter.con:name: venue
con:parameter.con:description: Return only venues matching the specified full/partial venue name (e.g. `Chicago`).

con:method.name: v2_artists

This call returns list of available artists.
Fetch lists of artists

con:parameter.con:name: artist_name
con:parameter.con:description: Return only artists matching the specified full/partial artist name (e.g. `PAW Patrol`).

con:parameter.con:name: size
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources. Default value is `20`.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: The page for paginating through the results.. Default value is `1`.
